availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry F. Riddle (Webster County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, resident. Franklin County, Illinois, native. Son of Thomas Riddle and Morgana Riddle. Married to Huldy Williams Riddle in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on August 5, 1852. Father of Martha Riddle, Manda Riddle, Robert Riddle, Mary Riddle, George Riddle, and Thomas Riddle. Resident of Williamson County, Illinois, in 1850. Resident of Webster County, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Williamson County, p. 213A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 224B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 2.
"H F Riddle (1831-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #89173643, accessed December 1, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89173643.
